name: Deliver 51
description:
Set foot on a quest that saves the World!

-

Deliver 51 is a nice and quick adventure game full of unforgetable moments. Dive in a quest where you take the shoes of a delivery boy.

In a world that's changed by CoVid-19, you will find strange interactions, dangers and surprises. Let yourself immerse in its narrative and you will reach your destination in an enjoyable manner.

Coming soon

-

Features:

  • Diferent Levels with distinct stories behind them
  • Intuitive gameplay
  • Original Art
  • Original 8-bit soundtrack
  • And even Memes!

Controls:

There are only 3 set of inputs in this game:

  • START : "Enter" key
  • Interact : "J" or "Z" keys
  • Movement: "🡑🡐🡓🡒" or "WASD" keys

THE TEAM!

  • Daniela Quaresma
    • Artist
  • João A Silva
    • Game Designer
  • Vasco Santos
    • Programmer

Software used:

  • To Build the world:
    • GB Studio
    • Tiled
    • Adobe Photoshop
  • Music
    • BeepBox
    • Open MPT

We would highly appreciate some feedback.
